1370: Scilla moved to Uterechse straet.B.1 after marriage.
Got married to Maelkin at age 19 in 1370.
Gave birth to Hersewindis in 1370 at age 19.
1373: Gave birth to Verthwi in 1373 at age 22.
1375: Gave birth to Snelgerus in 1375 at age 24.
1377: Gave birth to Agnes in 1377 at age 26.
1379: Gave birth to Lenildis in 1379 at age 28.
1381: Gave birth to Geile in 1381 at age 30.
1383: Gave birth to Sipper in 1383 at age 32.
1384: Gave birth to Ivone in 1384 at age 33.
1387: Lost son Ivone when Ivone was 4 years old.
1393: Lost daughter Agnes when Agnes was 17 years old.
